description: A Research Data File is a File that contains raw data originating from an Experiment.

ega_accession.description: The EGA accession ID of an entity.

format.description: The file format of the Research Data File (e.g., FASTQ, uBAM, FASTA).

included_in_submission.description: Whether a File is included in the Submission or not.

sequencing_lane_id.description: The identifier of a sequencing lane.

technical_replicate.description: An integer to indicate the technical replicate of this File.

title: ResearchDataFile
